Package io.cui.core.uimodel.result

Class ResultObject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cui.core.uimodel.result.ResultObject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - bounded result type, should implement Serializable
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResultOptional
    public class ResultObject<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable

    Generic ResultObject

    ResultObject provide Builder which supports a handy object creation. See example implementation for provider: 
    
 public ResultObject<Patient> retrievePatient(final SearchParameter param) {

     final Builder<Patient> builder = new ResultObject.Builder<>();
     builder.validDefaultResult(new Patient());

     try {
         builder.result(service.lookupPatient(param))
                 .state(ResultState.VALID);
     } catch (final NoSuchPatientException e) {
         private IDisplayNameProvider<?> detail = new DisplayName("No patient found");
         builder.resultDetail(new ResultDetail(detail, e))
                 .state(ResultState.ERROR);
     }

     return builder.build();
 }
    See example implementation for consumer: 
    
 public void buttonClicked() {

     final ResultObject<Patient> result = service.getPatient();
     if (!result.isValid()) {
         new MessageProducerAccessor().getValue().addGlobalMessage(resolve(content), FacesMessage.SEVERITY_WARN);
     } else {
         this.patient = result.getResult();
     }
 }
    Author:
    Eugen Fischer

      • ResultObject

        public ResultObject​(ResultObject<R> previousResult,
                    Function<R,​T> mapper,
                    T validDefault)
        Copy constructor. For the result it either maps the existing result using the given mapper or it uses the validDefault, if the previousResult is not isValid().
        Type Parameters:
        R - result type
        Parameters:
        previousResult - to be copied
        mapper - to map previousResult to the outcome type of this method
        validDefault - to be used if previousResult is not isValid()
